item.title: The Loophole Turning Stablecoins Into a Trillion-Dollar Fight
item.description: The GENIUS Act barred stablecoin issuers from paying interest. But in allowing cryptocurrency exchanges to offer rewards, it set off a high-stakes clash with the US banking industry.
